mapper.update:
UPDATE
id=#{id},
user_id=#{userId},
user_name=#{userName},
enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId},
full_name=#{fullName},
short_name=#{shortName},
logo=#{logo},
corporation=#{corporation},
business_nature=#{businessNature},
business_nature_name=#{businessNatureName},
enterprise_nature=#{enterpriseNature},
enterprise_nature_name=#{enterpriseNatureName},
registered_capital=#{registeredCapital},
found_year=#{foundYear},
major_business=#{majorBusiness},
business_license=#{businessLicense},
supplier_category=#{supplierCategory},
supplier_category_name=#{supplierCategoryName},
introduction=#{introduction},
introduction_text=#{introductionText},
flag=#{flag},
phone_prefix=#{phonePrefix},
phone_code=#{phoneCode},
phone_number=#{phoneNumber},
phone_ext=#{phoneExt},
fax_prefix=#{faxPrefix},
fax_code=#{faxCode},
fax_number=#{faxNumber},
fax_ext=#{faxExt},
wexin_mp=#{wexinMp},
website=#{website},
email=#{email},
country_code=#{countryCode},
country_name=#{countryName},
province_code=#{provinceCode},
province_name=#{provinceName},
city_code=#{cityCode},
city_name=#{cityName},
area_code=#{areaCode},
area_name=#{areaName},
address=#{address},
employee_count=#{employeeCount},
create_user=#{createUser},
create_date=#{createDate},
edit_user=#{editUser},
edit_date=#{editDate},
status=#{status},
submit_user=#{submitUser},
submit_date=#{submitDate},
audit_user=#{auditUser},
audit_user_name=#{auditUserName},
audit_user_true_name=#{auditUserTrueName},
audit_date=#{auditDate},
is_delete=#{isDelete},
delete_date=#{deleteDate},
delete_user=#{deleteUser},
timestamp=#{timestamp},
click_count=#{clickCount},
seq=#{seq},
qq=#{qq},
hotline=#{hotline},
create_user_scope=#{createUserScope},
submit_user_scope=#{submitUserScope},
delete_user_scope=#{deleteUserScope},
base_weight =#{baseWeight},
edit_user_scope =#{editUserScope},
registered_capital_unit =#{registeredCapitalUnit},
level =#{level},
level_name =#{levelName},
cust_refid=#{custRefid},
annual_output=#{annualOutput},
annual_output_unit=#{annualOutputUnit}
WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM
WHERE flag=#{flag} AND enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId} AND ifnull(is_delete,0)=0

SELECT e.id, e.user_id, e.user_name, e.enterprise_id, e.full_name, e.short_name, e.logo, e.corporation, e.business_nature, e.business_nature_name, e.enterprise_nature, e.enterprise_nature_name, e.registered_capital, e.found_year, e.major_business, e.business_license, e.supplier_category, e.supplier_category_name, e.introduction, e.introduction_text, e.flag, e.phone_prefix, e.phone_code, e.phone_number, e.phone_ext, e.fax_prefix, e.fax_code, e.fax_number, e.fax_ext, e.wexin_mp, e.website, e.email, e.country_code, e.country_name, e.province_code, e.province_name, e.city_code, e.city_name, e.area_code, e.area_name, e.address, e.employee_count, e.create_user, e.create_date, e.edit_user, e.edit_date, e.status, e.submit_user, e.submit_date, e.audit_user, e.audit_user_name, e.audit_user_true_name, e.audit_date, e.is_delete, e.delete_date, e.delete_user, e.timestamp, e.click_count, e.seq, e.qq, e.hotline, u.power, e.create_user_scope, e.submit_user_scope, e.delete_user_scope, e.base_weight, e.edit_user_scope, e.registered_capital_unit, e.level, e.level_name, e.cust_refid, e.annual_output, e.annual_output_unit FROM e JOIN t_gb_enterprise_user u ON u.enterprise_id=e.enterprise_id WHERE e.flag=#{flag} AND u.user_id=#{userId} AND ifnull(e.is_delete,0)=0

SELECT
FROM
AND full_name like CONCAT('%',#{e.fullName},'%')
AND is_delete=0 AND flag=1

SELECT
FROM
WHERE enterprise_id IN
#{id}
AND flag=1
